alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Lorain; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 19 at 6:24PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM EST FOR MEDINA...CUYAHOGA...NORTHERN SUMMIT AND LORAIN COUNTIES... At 622 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Lorain to Grafton to 6 miles northwest of Shreve, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Vermilion, Western Vermilion, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent, Solon and Avon Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
